description: Residents of Guernsey, Jersey and the Isle of Man must pay if they do not receive income support.
title: Licence fee: BBC to fund some over-75s licence fees in Crown Dependencies
title_page: Licence fee: BBC to fund some over-75s licence fees in Crown Dependencies - BBC News
maintext: Isle of Man Treasury Minister Alfred Cannan said the island's government would now "determine the position" of those not on income support and hoped to have a decision by the end of the week.
